application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: Works agreed to tree labelled T1
Works agreed to tree labelled T2
Works agreed to tree labelled T3
Works agreed to tree labelled T8
Works agreed to tree labelled T5
Works agreed to tree labelled T6
Works agreed to tree labelled T7
Works agreed to tree labelled T4
description: Back Garden (Right Boundary) T1: Privet tree - Reduce height by 1 metre height 4m & spread 5m. Reduce height to 3 & spread to 5mT2: Mixed hedge - Reduce height down to lowest section in middle of hedge, trim to shape (garden side only) height 5m & spread 3m. Reduce height to 4.5m & spread to 3mback Boundary T3: Holly tree x3 - Trim to shape height 3m & spread 1.5m. Reduce height to 2.9m & spread to 1.4mBack Left Boundary T4: Apple tree - Reduce height by 1 mere, thin canopy by 10%, remove major deadwood height 4m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 3m & spread to 3.5mT5: Mixed hedge - Reduce height by 0.5 metre, trim to shape height 4m & spread 5m. Reduce height to 3.5m & spread to 5mT6: Yucca tree - Remove ivy from climbing up tree, remove dead seed pods and old leaves height 4m & spread 2m. Reduce height to 4m & spread to 2mFront Garden (left boundary) T7: Holly and bay trees (located at entrance) - Trim to shape 0.5M height 6m & spread 3m. Reduce height to 5.5m & spread to 3.8MFront Boundary T8: Privet hedge - Reduce height by 0.5 metre, trim sides to shape height 4m & spread 7m. Reduce height to 3.5m & spread to 7m
